data.name: Woodpunk Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the Woodpunk Original Soundtrack!

1. Aquinas (Main Theme)
2. Jetpack Riders (G-Nova 1)
3. March of he Lumber (G-Nova 2)
4. Syracuse (Sicily Alpha 1)
5. Requiescant (Sicily Alpha 2)
6. The Crossing of the Alps (Trintio 1)
7. Winter’s Embrace (Trintio 2)
8. Adriatic Strife (Iso Bari 1)
9. Marshland Jazz (Iso Bari 2)
10. Moment of Fate (Rhomega 1)
11. Machina Jacta Est (Rhomega 2)
12. I Bring the Light (Boss Theme 1)
13. The Woodborg (Boss Theme 2)
14. A Spark of Genius (Lab 1)
15. Machine Learning (Lab 2)
16. Oh Snapped! (Game Over)
17. Nailed it! (Boss Defeated)
18. Aquinas (Trailer version)



Music by Felipe González Fanjul
data.about_the_game:
Enjoy the Woodpunk Original Soundtrack!

1. Aquinas (Main Theme)
2. Jetpack Riders (G-Nova 1)
3. March of he Lumber (G-Nova 2)
4. Syracuse (Sicily Alpha 1)
5. Requiescant (Sicily Alpha 2)
6. The Crossing of the Alps (Trintio 1)
7. Winter’s Embrace (Trintio 2)
8. Adriatic Strife (Iso Bari 1)
9. Marshland Jazz (Iso Bari 2)
10. Moment of Fate (Rhomega 1)
11. Machina Jacta Est (Rhomega 2)
12. I Bring the Light (Boss Theme 1)
13. The Woodborg (Boss Theme 2)
14. A Spark of Genius (Lab 1)
15. Machine Learning (Lab 2)
16. Oh Snapped! (Game Over)
17. Nailed it! (Boss Defeated)
18. Aquinas (Trailer version)



Music by Felipe González Fanjul
data.short_description: Enjoy 18 awesome songs from the Woodpunk Original Soundtrack and get pumped up for your next mission!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 530 series 2.0 GB (or euivalent)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX El Capitan (or above)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4000 series (or equivalent) with support for OpenGL
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 (or equivalent distro)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 530 series 2.0 GB (or equivalent) with support for OpenGL
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
